articles.title: Another Donald Trump term won’t break American democracy
articles.description: I believe in America enough to think that it would take more than another term of Trump as president to destroy American democracy.
articles.content:
“Believing in America” can mean two distinct things. First, you can believe in what America stands for. Second, you can believe that America will come good in the end. The two ideas are related – but they are not the same.
